name: ZET SPY
description:
In this Game There will a spaceship it will Operated by User  Where The Spaceship  is Used by user to Survive in the space.

So that the user has to operate the spaceship to reach  its Destination .

In this process the Aliens will Attack our spaceship .we have to survive and reach the spaceship to its destination  in-order to defend the user can use bullets or by  moving away from  aliens

In this process user can collect coins and make his score
